Package org.glassfish.jersey.client.filter

Provides core client filters.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CsrfProtectionFilter Simple client-side filter that adds X-Requested-By headers to all state-changing request (i.e.
EncodingFeature Feature that configures support for content encodings on the client side.
EncodingFilter Client filter adding support for content encoding.
HttpBasicAuthFilter Client filter adding HTTP Basic Authentication header to the HTTP request, if no such header is already present.
 

Package org.glassfish.jersey.client.filter Description

Provides core client filters.
